DOC.brief_summary: The feasibility of combining a motor and cognitive exercise program with dietary supplementation (DDU: Vitamin D, DHA and Uridine or Placebo) is tested in a smaller group of prepubescent children.
DOC.brief_title: Dietary Supplementation of of DHA, Vitamin D3 and Uridine in Children
DOC.criteria: age 8 to 11 yrs. history of neurological or psychiatric disorders.
